name: Cleaner for Gmail‚Ñ¢
tagline: A Google Workspace Add-on that automates your Gmail inbox management to save you time.
description: Cleaner for Gmail‚Ñ¢ is an intelligent add-on that allows you to create automation rules to automatically organize your emails. It helps you maintain a clean and organized inbox by applying automatic actions based on customizable criteria.
shortDescription: Automate your Gmail inbox management. Create custom rules to organize emails automatically, archive newsletters, and maintain a clean inbox with intelligent automation.
